mapper.select: SELECT ACCOUNT AS account, REAL_NAME AS realName, CITY AS city, DISTRICT AS district, ADDRESS AS address, PHONE_NUM AS phoneNum, URL AS url FROM USER_INFO WHERE ACCOUNT = #{account}
SELECT ACCOUNT AS account, REAL_NAME AS realName, CITY AS city, DISTRICT AS district, ADDRESS AS address, PHONE_NUM AS phoneNum, URL AS url FROM USER_INFO WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT ACCOUNT AS account, REAL_NAME AS realName, CITY AS city, DISTRICT AS district, ADDRESS AS address, PHONE_NUM AS phoneNum, URL AS url FROM USER_INFO WHERE CITY = #{city}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO( ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, REAL_NAME, CITY, DISTRICT, ADDRESS, PHONE_NUM, URL, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES( #{account}, #{password}, #{realName}, #{city}, #{district}, #{address}, #{phoneNum}, #{url}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET REAL_NAME=#{realName}, PASSWORD=#{password}, CITY=#{city}, DISTRICT=#{district}, ADDRESS=#{address}, PHONE_NUM=#{phoneNum}, URL=#{url}, UPDATE_TIME=now() WHERE ACCOUNT = #{account}
